title: Missing Security Headers
description:
The application is missing critical security headers that protect against common web vulnerabilities. The following security headers are absent:
- X-Frame-Options (protection against clickjacking)
- X-XSS-Protection (browser XSS filter)
- X-Content-Type-Options (MIME-sniffing protection)
- Content-Security-Policy (controls resource loading)
- Strict-Transport-Security (enforces HTTPS)

These headers provide defense-in-depth security controls that help mitigate various attack vectors including clickjacking, MIME-sniffing attacks, and cross-site scripting.
impact:
The absence of these security headers increases the attack surface of the application. Specifically:
- Lack of X-Frame-Options allows the page to be embedded in iframes, enabling clickjacking attacks
- Missing Content-Security-Policy allows execution of inline scripts and loading resources from any domain, facilitating XSS attacks
- Absence of X-Content-Type-Options allows MIME-sniffing, potentially leading to unexpected content interpretation
- Missing HSTS header doesn't enforce HTTPS connections, leaving users vulnerable to man-in-the-middle attacks
evidence:
POC Execution Results:
```
=== FULL RESPONSE HEADERS ===
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Date: Fri, 07 Nov 2025 19:08:00 GMT
Server: Apache/2.4.54 (Debian)
X-Powered-By: PHP/7.4.33
Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8

=== SECURITY HEADER CHECK ===
[✗] X-Frame-Options: MISSING
[✗] X-XSS-Protection: MISSING
[✗] X-Content-Type-Options: MISSING
[✗] Content-Security-Policy: MISSING
[✗] Strict-Transport-Security: MISSING

Summary: 5 of 5 security headers are missing
```

The POC confirmed that all critical security headers are absent from HTTP responses across the application.
remediation:
Add the following security headers to all HTTP responses:

1. X-Frame-Options: DENY or SAMEORIGIN
2. X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
3. X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block
4. Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net; style-src 'self' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net 'unsafe-inline'
5. Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains

For Apache, add to .htaccess or httpd.conf:
```
Header always set X-Frame-Options "SAMEORIGIN"
Header always set X-Content-Type-Options "nosniff"
Header always set X-XSS-Protection "1; mode=block"
Header always set Content-Security-Policy "default-src 'self'"
Header always set Strict-Transport-Security "max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains"
```

For PHP, add to code:
```php
header("X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN");
header("X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff");
header("X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block");
header("Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'");
header("Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains");
```
